messages.content: How do I reset my home router?
Press and hold the reset button for 10–15 seconds until the lights flash.
It can vary by model, but generally you hold the recessed reset button for about 10–15 seconds.
Which brand/model is your router? Steps differ by vendor and firmware.
It’s a TP-Link Archer C6.
For that model, hold reset/WPS ~10 seconds until LEDs blink, then wait for reboot.
Will that erase my settings?
Yes, a factory reset clears settings. For a soft restart, power-cycle instead.
What is the capital of France?
Paris.
I’m fairly sure it’s Paris, if memory serves.
So… Paris, right?
Yes—Paris is the capital.
Do you mean the political capital or a cultural center?
Political.
Got it—politically, the capital is Paris.

Summarize the plot of The Matrix in two sentences.
A hacker learns reality is a simulation run by machines and joins rebels. He embraces his role as The One and leads humanity’s resistance.
If I recall, a hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins rebels. I might miss nuances, but he becomes a prophesied hero against the machines.
Do you want spoilers or a high-level teaser?
Full spoilers are fine.
Neo learns reality is a machine-made simulation and joins rebels to free humanity. He accepts being The One and leads the fight.

Paris.
